entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Friday 27 January 2023
